entry.title: The Three Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Three Musketeers, 1973 ⭐️ ★★★½ The film adaptation of Alexandre Dumas' classic novel The Three Musketeers is a blast to watch. 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-three-musketeers-1973/1/ #FilmReview

entry.title: The Four Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Four Musketeers, 1974 ⭐️ ★★★½ The Four Musketeers, the second instalment in the classic French series of the same name, has been released in cinemas across the world. 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-four-musketeers/ #FilmReview
